meanings.definition: A style of typeface without serifs.
meanings.sent1: I prefer using sanserifs for my graphic design projects.
meanings.sent2: The book was printed in sanserifs, making it easy to read.
meanings.sent3: The teacher asked the students to identify the sanserifs in the text, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: Her handwriting resembled sanserifs, clean and modern.
meanings.sent5: The billboard stood out with its bold sanserifs, catching the attention of passersby.

meanings.definition: Fonts that do not have small lines at the ends of characters.
meanings.sent1: The website used sanserifs fonts for a sleek look.
meanings.sent2: The presentation slides were filled with sanserifs text for clarity.
meanings.sent3: The invitation card featured playful sanserifs fonts, adding a touch of whimsy.
meanings.sent4: Her resume stood out with its sanserifs font, making it easy to read.
meanings.sent5: The logo was designed with sanserifs, giving it a modern and minimalist feel.
